SEARCH
Module net.cnoga.paint
Package net.cnoga.paint.core.util

Class ShapeUtil

java.lang.Object
net.cnoga.paint.core.util.ShapeUtil
public final class ShapeUtil extends Object
Utility methods for creating and rendering common geometric shapes.

Supports rectangle, ellipse, polygon, and path generation with fill and stroke application.

  • Method Details

    • drawShape

      public static void drawShape(javafx.scene.canvas.GraphicsContext gc, double x0, double y0, double x1, double y1, ShapeConfig config)
      Draws a shape defined by two bounding coordinates and a ShapeConfig.
      Parameters:
      gc - the GraphicsContext to draw on
      x0 - the first x-coordinate (corner of bounding box)
      y0 - the first y-coordinate (corner of bounding box)
      x1 - the second x-coordinate (opposite corner of bounding box)
      y1 - the second y-coordinate (opposite corner of bounding box)
      config - the ShapeConfig describing type and properties
